name: Mystina

task.description: Installing CJK Fonts for proper Asian font display
task.name: winetricks

task.description:
Installing Chrome...
PLEASE close the Chrome after it opens to finish installation!
task.name: wineexec

task.description:
Installing Mystina...
PLEASE close the Mystina after it opens to finish installation!
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- browser: https://nchc.dl.sourceforge.net/project/portableapps/Google%20Chrome%20Portable/GoogleChromePortable64_80.0.3987.149_online.paf.exe
- installer: http://dl.altamm.com.hk/mystina/MO_Setup_20191206.zip
game:
  arch: win64
  args: -incognito --app=https://mo.alta.hk/loginpage/
  exe: drive_c/GoogleChromePortable64/GoogleChromePortable.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting up wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: cjkfonts
    arch: win64
    description: Installing CJK Fonts for proper Asian font display
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    src: browser
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: 'Installing Chrome...

      PLEASE close the Chrome after it opens to finish installation!'
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GoogleChromePortable64_80.0.3987.149_online.paf.exe
    name: wineexec
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    src: installer
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/MO_Setup/
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/MO_Setup_20191206.zip
    format: zip
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: 'Installing Mystina...

      PLEASE close the Mystina after it opens to finish installation!'
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/MO_Setup/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  d9vk: true
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: lutris-fshack-5.2-x86_64
